-- REMEMBER to replace the datalake account url

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake3mstaeetovkk4.dfs.core.windows.net/landing/adventureworkslt/tables/parquet/SalesLT.Product.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
